title: Terraform Provider Schema
description: A JSON document that represents the schema of an entire Terraform provider.

provider.description: The schema for the provider's configuration.

resource_schemas.description: The schemas for managed resources in this provider.

data_source_schemas.description: The schemas for data sources in this provider.

functions.description: The definitions for functions in this provider.

Schema.description: The representation of a particular schema (provider config, managed resource, data source)

block.description: The root-level block of configuration values.

deprecated.description: If true, this schema is deprecated.

Block.description: A nested block within a particular schema.

attributes.description: The attributes defined within this block.

block_types.description: The nested blocks defined within this block.

description_kind.description: The format of the description. If no kind is provided, it can be assumed to be plain text.

deprecated.description: If true, this block is deprecated.

BlockType.description: The top-level metadata for a nested block within a schema.

nesting_mode.description: The nesting mode for this block.

block.description: The block data for this block type, including attributes and subsequent nested blocks.

min_items.description: The lower limit on items that can be declared of this block type

max_items.description: The upper limit on items that can be declared of this block type

Attribute.description: An attribute in a schema block, nested attribute, or nested block.

type.description: The attribute type. Either type or nested_type is set, never both.

nested_type.description: Details about a nested attribute type. Either type or nested_type is set, never both.

description_kind.description: The format of the description. If no kind is provided, it can be assumed to be plain text.

deprecated.description: If true, this attribute is deprecated.

required.description: If true, this attribute is required - it has to be entered in configuration.

optional.description: If true, this attribute is optional - it does not need to be entered in configuration.

computed.description: If true, this attribute is computed - it can be set by the provider. It may also be set by configuration if optional is true.

sensitive.description: If true, this attribute is sensitive and will not be displayed in logs.

NestedAttributeType.description: The top-level metadata for a nested attribute within a schema.

nesting_mode.description: The nesting mode for this attribute.

min_items.description: The lower limit on the number of items that can be declared of this attribute type (not applicable to single nesting mode).

max_items.description: The upper limit on number of items that can be declared of this attribute type (not applicable to single nesting mode).

DescriptionKind.description: Describes the format type for a particular description's field. If no kind is provided, it can be assumed to be plain text.

NestingBlockMode.description: The nesting mode for a particular nested schema block.

NestingAttributeMode.description: The nesting mode for a particular nested schema attribute.

CtyType.$comment: The type system for Terraform/HCL is defined in the go-cty library
CtyType.description: A type that is used by Terraform core for early validation and conversions.

oneOf.$comment: Collections (maps, sets, lists) are represented with two items in a tuple, while objects have potentially three items in a tuple, with the final item being optional attributes.
oneOf.description: Complex types like maps, sets, lists, objects.

FunctionSignature.description: A function signature for a provider-defined function.

summary.description: A shortened description of the function.

deprecation_message.description: A message that indicates that the function should be considered deprecated and what actions should be performed by the practitioner to handle the deprecation.

variadic_parameter.description: The function's variadic parameter if it is supported.

description.description: The human-readable description of the argument.

is_nullable.description: If true, null will be an acceptable value for the argument.

type.description: A type that an argument for this parameter must conform to.
